channel.title: CVE Feed for SHARP CORPORATION -- Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SHARP CORPORATION -- Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services

item.title: CVE-2024-23783|2024-02-14T10:02:32.489Z -- SHARP CORPORATION -- Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to access the affected product without authentication.

item.title: CVE-2024-23785|2024-02-14T10:07:11.603Z -- SHARP CORPORATION -- Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services
item.description: Cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to change the product settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-23789|2024-02-14T10:35:11.140Z -- SHARP CORPORATION -- Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services
item.description: Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command on the affected product.

item.title: CVE-2024-23788|2024-02-14T10:10:41.448Z -- SHARP CORPORATION -- Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services
item.description: Server-side request forgery vulnerability in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to send an arbitrary HTTP request (GET) from the affected product.

item.title: CVE-2024-23784|2024-02-14T10:05:55.231Z -- SHARP CORPORATION -- Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability exists in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier, which may allow a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to obtain a username and its hashed password displayed on the management page of the affected product.

item.title: CVE-2024-23787|2024-02-14T10:09:45.961Z -- SHARP CORPORATION -- Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to obtain an arbitrary file in the affected product.

item.title: CVE-2024-23786|2024-02-14T10:08:32.703Z -- SHARP CORPORATION -- Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who is accessing the management page of the affected product.
